name: PowerCenter:Avoid unmapped target column
description: List all Workflows and Worklets with unmapped target column
output:
This report lists all Workflows and Worklets with unmapped target fields
it provides the following information
Workflow full name, target field name
rationale: For understandability and maintainability, unmapped target fieds should be avoided. If a session is in insert or data driven mode, having unmapped target fields could cause unexpected behavior.
remediation: Map every fields of target objects, even if you have to use an expression before with default values.
total: Total number of Workflows and Worklets
